original_title: La Femme de Chambre, Un Corps sans Visage
overview: A short film shot on July 2, 2011 that directly refers to the DSK case. In voice-over, with an echo in English, the inner monologue of a maid who wears makeup, hair, wounds, whose body has disappeared in suffering. A reflection on loneliness and confinement.
title: La Femme de Chambre, Un Corps sans Visage
